tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TripCosts (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(255),
  cost DECIMAL,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  profitability DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_analysis (
    revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_id INT,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
    profit DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trip_cost(trip_id)
);

CREATE TABLE profitability (
  profitability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT NOT NULL,
  cost_of_trip DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  revenue_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips(trip_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (revenue_id) REFERENCES revenues(revenue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  destination TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT NOT NULL,
  expense_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips (trip_id)
)

CREATE TABLE revenues (
  revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT NOT NULL,
  revenue_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips (trip_id)
)

CREATE TABLE profitability (
  profitability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT NOT NULL,
  profit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips (trip_id)
)
